comment: I’m signing this because I think Amber heard is in the wrong and she needs to do the right thing and apologize to Johnny Depp for accusing him of abuse
commentable_entity.title: JUSTICE FOR JOHNNY DEPP
commentable_entity.description:
I had never heard of Amber Heard until I googled who Johnny Depp was with fairly recently and she was listed as his last ex-wife. Oddly enough although unbeknownst to me, Johnny Depps' defamation lawsuit trial against Amber Heard was to begin shortly after my Google search and thus it began. 

The pain and shame endured still lingers on Johnny's face and in his body language. As he speaks and relives the absolute atrocities that was his relationship with Amber; he begins to crouch inward with his shoulders held up towards his ears, signalling insecurity and fear. This man is clearly a victim of domestic abuse. 

The unfathomable acts of Amber Heard is just more proof of exactly the monster Johnny is up against. Amber repeatedly and secretly recorded their arguments where Johnny was especially upset, she used narcissistic and gaslighting tactics constantly, she even prevented Johnny from leaving, basically holding him against his will (forcible confinement) and the most bizarre of all, she took a sh*t on HIS side of the bed before leaving to Coachella for 2 days.

The trial is ongoing, and there's plenty of videos on YouTube to review at your leisure. It's 100% evident that Mr. Johnny Depp deserves justice. He deserves redemption, he deserves peace, he deserves respect and love and most importantly he deserves to continue doing what he does best: ACT! Johnny Depp has been a household name for decades and he will remain as such for decades to come.

To Warner Bros and Toby Emmerich, I and everyone who signs this petition think it be in your best interests to publicly apologize to Johnny Depp and offer his role in the Fantastic Beasts movie as the dark wizard Gellert Grindelwald if he wishes to continue working with you. 

--

To Disney, Mr. Johnny Depp is the only Jack Sparrow, he is the very essence of every single movie he has ever done. Without him it is a likening to the Earth without a sun. It cannot be.

Thank you, from 99% of the world.

PLEASE SIGN THIS PETITION IN SUPPORT OF AND FOR THE LOVE OF MR. JOHNNY DEPP, WE LOVE YOU!!!

#justiceforjohnnydepp

comment: I totally believe Amber Heard is the abuser, and she is trashing this good man's name because she is mentally ill.
